ygData.subject: Re: Trying to add to the confusion
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually I ve done the quest it s a bit drawn out, but I did get tattered gloves. So, it appears we must repeat this quest again and again to get a
ygData.messageBody:
>
>
> Found out something interesting on stratististics. One of the quests from
> Gem Choppers hall (Warriors Guild) rewards people with Tattered armor.
> I've only talked to 1 person who has done this quest and he recieved
> Tattered cloth arm bands as his reward. Maybe this is the place to obtain
> the cloak.
>
> Cheers,
> Malkin
>

Actually I've done the quest it's a bit drawn out, but I did get "tattered"
gloves.
So, it appears we must repeat this quest again and again to get a cloak?

Which would make sense, sort of, if Thermal Cloaks are REALLY cool.
(Ok, I'm dreaming about Thermal Cloaks doing damage like a Flame Shield)


-Zikkin
